name: The Green
description: This can be played as a game with a score, aiming to beat a robot cleaning up fragments from explosions. Also discover how many ways objects can respond when you click them. But this is not offered as the greatest game in the world. It is more of a demonstrator. It shows what can be done in 3 dimensions in the simple 2D HTML canvas using only vanilla JavaScript. It shows that JavaScript in this environment is not as slow as many people believe. It is also meant to encourage creative developers by showing that  they do not need to learn any other frameworks or libraries.
